titleStmt.title: Israel's redemption or the propheticall history of our Saviours kingdome on earth; that is, of the church Catholicke, and triumphant. With a discourse of Gog and Magog, or The battle of the great day of God almightie. / By Robert Maton minister and Mr of Arts, and sometimes commoner of Wadham Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Maton, Robert, 1607-1653?

titleStmt.title: Israel's redemption or the propheticall history of our Saviours kingdome on earth; that is, of the church Catholicke, and triumphant. With a discourse of Gog and Magog, or The battle of the great day of God almightie. / By Robert Maton minister and Mr of Arts, and sometimes commoner of Wadham Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Maton, Robert, 1607-1653?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Cotes] for Daniel Frere, and are to be sold at his shop in little Britaine at the signe of the red Bull,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf bears a verse beginning: Goe little booke, ..
"Gog and Magog, .. printed by R. Cotes, for Daniel Frere" has separate dated title page; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
